trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> elements that can be used in an XML digital signature derive.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象基底類別的所有<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>可以使用 XML 數位簽章中的項目衍生。

trans-unit.source: When performing XML signing and verification, the <`Transform`> element describes how the signer transformed the data object that was signed.
trans-unit.target: 執行 XML 簽章和驗證時`Transform`> 項目會描述簽署者的已簽署的資料物件的轉換方式。

trans-unit.source: The verifier of a document then uses the <`Transform`> element to transform the signed data in the same manner.
trans-unit.target: 文件的驗證器接著會使用`Transform`> 項目来轉換的帶正負號的資料相同的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the verifier cannot transform the signed data in the same manner, the document cannot be verified.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證器無法轉換的簽章的資料的相同方式，就無法驗證文件。

trans-unit.source: Use a class that derives from the Transform class whenever you need to add one or more transform objects to an encrypted XML document or to a signed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 使用衍生自轉換類別，每當您需要加入一或多個轉換物件加密的 XML 文件或帶正負號的 XML 文件的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<Transform>` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`<Transform>`項目，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，可用於從 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 或可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C XML 加密規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the algorithm performed by the current transform.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可識別目前的轉換所執行的演算法統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the Algorithm attribute of a `<Transform>` element in an XMLDSIG signature.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會對應至的演算法屬性`<Transform>`XMLDSIG 簽章中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, the algorithm URI for the Base64 decoding transform is defined as http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64 in the XMLDSIG specification (Section 6.6.2).
trans-unit.target: 例如，Base64 解碼轉換演算法的 URI 被定義為 http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64 XMLDSIG 規格 （章節 6.6.2） 中。

trans-unit.source: You can conveniently set this value using one of the static fields associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，您可以設定此值使用其中一種<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml>類別</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml>相關聯的靜態欄位

trans-unit.source: The URI that identifies the algorithm performed by the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 識別目前所執行的演算法的 URI <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents the document context under which the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object is running.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>物件，代表所在的文件內容目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件正在執行。

trans-unit.source: When signing a document, the Context property represents the value passed to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性時簽署文件，代表要傳遞的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml>建構函式。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml>

trans-unit.source: When verifying a document, the Context property represents <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> object.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性時驗證文件，代表<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>

trans-unit.source: The Context property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 簽章計算和檢查期間，但在叫用轉換之前，會自動設定的內容屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents the document context under which the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object is running.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>物件，代表所在的文件內容目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件正在執行。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the digest associated with a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回與相關聯的摘要<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> object used to create a digest.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref>用來建立摘要物件。

trans-unit.source: The digest associated with a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的摘要<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回參數的 XML 表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>都適合用來為 XMLDSIG 的子元素所包含的物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表特定轉換的內容說明目前所需的 XML 節點的清單<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>中 XMLDSIG 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>指定型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: The GetOutput method returns the output of the current transform after it is run on the value previously set by a call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 執行先前的呼叫所設定的值之後，GetOutput 方法會傳回目前的轉換輸出<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be one of the type objects in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是其中一個型別物件中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之輸出的類型。

trans-unit.source: This must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes*>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.OutputTypes*>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object as an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件做為指定類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object returned by this method conforms to the XML Scheme for the `<Transform>` element defined in Section 4.3.3.4 of the XMLDSIG specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>這個方法所傳回的物件符合 XML 配置`<Transform>`區段 4.3.3.4 XMLDSIG 規格中定義的項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得有效的輸入類型的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the InputTypes property must contain at least one element because every <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object must accept at least one type as valid input.
trans-unit.target: InputTypes 屬性所傳回的陣列必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>物件必須接受做為有效的輸入至少一個型別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform> object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>物件通常會接受一或多個下列類型做為輸入︰ <xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸入類型的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件; 您可以將只有其中一個這些類型的物件傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會剖析指定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>物件做為轉換特定內容的<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目，並設定目前的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件以符合<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來處理元素的子元素`<Transform>`項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object that specifies transform-specific content for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>物件，指定目前的轉換專屬內容<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，自動將目前載入指定的輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件的類型必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.InputTypes%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入到目前之輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得會從可能的輸出之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the OutputTypes property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.
trans-unit.target: OutputTypes 屬性所傳回的陣列必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個轉換必須產生做為輸出的至少一個型別。

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸出型別的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件，只有物件的下列其中一種會從傳回型別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*>方法在目前的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>物件，其中包含會傳播到簽章的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: XML namespaces are used to distinguish different elements in a document that have the same name.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空間用來區分不同文件中具有相同名稱的不同元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> keys of the PropagatedNamespaces property are the namespace prefixes and the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> values are the namespace Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>PropagatedNamespaces 屬性的索引鍵是命名空間前置詞和<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>的值為命名空間統一資源識別元 (Uri)。</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The PropagatedNamespaces property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 簽章計算和檢查期間，但在叫用轉換之前，會自動設定 PropagatedNamespaces 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>物件，其中包含會傳播到簽章的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The PropagatedNamespaces property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: PropagatedNamespaces 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前<xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> class resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>類別解析由統一資源識別元 (URI) 名為的外部 XML 資源。</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If you do not trust the source of the XML file, you might not want to allow the XML file to access computer resources named by the URI.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不信任來源的 XML 檔案，您可能不想要允許存取電腦資源 URI 所名為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The Resolver property allows you to control the level of access that XML files have to computer resources by specifying different <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> objects.
trans-unit.target: 解析程式屬性可讓您控制的電腦資源已藉由指定不同的 XML 檔案的存取層級<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to allow any access, you can set this property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果不想讓任何存取，您可以將此屬性`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property defaults to an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性預設為<xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>物件。
